As at 31 December 2017, the Group has cash and cash equivalents placed with banks in the People’s Republic of China denominated in Chinese Renminbi (“RMB) amounting to approximately RMB 14,954,000 (2016: RMB 15,974,000). The RMB is not freely convertible into foreign currencies. Under the People’s Republic of China's Foreign Exchange Control Regulations and Administration of Settlement, Sale and Payment of Foreign Exchange Regulations, the Group is permitted to exchange RMB for foreign currencies through banks that are authorised to conduct foreign exchange business.
